attributes.action: tax, and tax heavily, the sale of mild cheese
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(i) because this government loves raising taxes and needs money for essential causes such as the olympic games

(ii) because mild cheese brings no pleasure

(iii) because fine wines do not belong with such cheese

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
